ABOUT US
About Climat
Foundation

At Climat Foundation, we are committed to preventing environmental catastrophes and reducing their terrible effects on Earth. Our goal as a non-governmental organisation (NGO) is to build a future that is both stable and sustainable. We recognise the critical importance of responding to and mitigating the effects of natural disasters.

Our Vision

Our vision is a world where communities are resilient, ecosystems are protected, and the impacts of environmental disasters are minimized. We work towards a sustainable and harmonious future where human activities can coexist with nature, ensuring the well-being of present and future generations.

Our Mission

Our mission is to actively strive to minimise the impacts of environmental disasters through research, education, advocacy, as well as community engagement. Our goal is to build a proactive and resilient society that is ready and capable of mitigating the catastrophic effects of natural calamities.
